long_description:
This room contains pyramids of barrel fixtures lining each side of the room along the walls.  It's possible that something inside these barrels could be valuable.  There is a small visible gap between two barrel pyramids where it looks like there is a small opening, the size of the palm of your hand, on the wall.

There is a door to the north which leads to the Diamond Room.  There is a passageway on the east wall leading to the Armory.  There is an opening, looks like the end of a chute, on the south end leading to the Southwest Corridor.
short_description:
Room full of barrels that you can smash.  There is also an open slot in the wall.
There is a door(exit) to the north which leads to the Diamond Room, passageway(exit) on east wall that leads to the Armory, and opening(exit) on south end leading to the Southwest Corridor.

Armored Skeleton.name: Armored Skeleton
Armored Skeleton.description: An armored skeleton lumbers towards you, a large broadsword in its seketal hand, it means to end your existence.
